member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Handles projectResponse related requests

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.PerhapsUpdateProjectList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of projects from the db
member.returns: A list of projects or error details

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.Get
member.summary: Returns the list of projects available to the user
member.returns: List of available projects

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetRandomEntries
member.summary: TEST CODE: generate random projectResponse data entries
member.returns: Random projectResponse data entries

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.Get(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Returns the projectResponse data for the given projectResponse. If geofenceUid is not specified, data for the entire projectResponse area is returned otherwise data for the geofenced area is returned. If no date range specified, returns data for the last 2 years to today in the projectResponse time zone otherwise returns data for the specified date range.
member.param: Start date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
End date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
member.returns: List of data entries for each day in date range and the status of volume retrieval for the projectResponse

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetWeights(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns the weights for all geofences for the projectResponse for the date range of the last 2 years to today in the projectResponse time zone.
member.returns: List of entries for each day in date range and the weight for each geofence for that day

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetGeofenceWeights(LandfillService.Common.Models.ProjectResponse)
member.summary: Retrieves weights entries for each geofence in the projectResponse.
member.returns: List of dates with the weight for each geofence for that date

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.PostWeights(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Saves weights submitted in the request.
member.returns: Project data and status of volume retrieval

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetVolumeTimeSummary(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Gets volume and time summary for a landfill projectResponse.
member.returns: Current week volume, current month volume, remaining volume (air space) and time remaining (days)

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.CurrentWeekMonday(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns the date representing the Monday of the week the given date falls in.
member.param: The date for which to find the start of the week
member.returns: The date of the Monday of that week

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetAirspaceVolumeInBackground(System.String,LandfillService.Common.Models.ProjectResponse,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves airspace volume summary from Raptor.
member.param: Indicates if filtering by earliest or latest cell pass

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetProjectStatisticsInBackground(System.String,LandfillService.Common.Models.ProjectResponse)
member.summary: Retrieves projectResponse statistics from Raptor.
member.returns: Date extents from projectResponse statistics

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetGeofences(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Returns a list of geofences for the projectResponse. A geofence is associated with a projectResponse if its boundary is inside or intersects that of the projectResponse and it is of type 'Landfill'. The projectResponse geofence is also returned.
member.returns: List of geofences with their bounding boxes

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetGeofenceBoundary(System.UInt32,System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a geofence boundary.
member.returns: List of WGS84 boundary points in radians

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetCCARatio(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets CCA ratio data on a daily basis for a landfill projectResponse for all machines. If geofenceUid is not specified, CCA ratio data for the entire projectResponse area is returned otherwise CCA ratio data for the geofenced area is returned. If no date range specified, returns CCA ratio data for the last 2 years to today in the projectResponse time zone otherwise returns CCA ratio data for the specified date range.
member.param: Start date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
End date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
member.returns: List of machines and daily CCA ratio

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetCCASummary(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.Nullable{System.UInt32},System.String,System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Gets CCA summary data for a landfill projectResponse for the specified date. If geofenceUid is not specified, CCA summary data for the entire projectResponse area is returned otherwise CCA data for the geofenced area is returned. If machine (asset ID, machine name and John Doe flag) is not specified, returns data for all machines else for the specified machine. If lift ID is not specified returns data for all lifts else for the specified lift.
member.param: Date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
member.returns: CCA summary for the date

member.name: M:LandfillService.WebApi.Controllers.ProjectsController.GetMachineLifts(System.UInt32,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of machines and lifts for a landfill projectResponse. If no date range specified, the last 2 years to today in the projectResponse time zone is used.
member.param: Start date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
End date in projectResponse time zone for which to return data
member.returns: List of machines and lifts in projectResponse time zone
